did.unittitle: A brief sketch of the life of Noble D. Preston

repository.corpname: The New York Public Library. Manuscripts and Archives Division.

address.addressline: Fifth Avenue at 42nd Street, New York, NY 10018-2788

did.abstract: Noble D. Preston was a Captain in the 10th New York Cavalry. This manuscript volume includes reminiscences of his service in the Civil War, biographical sketches of Lieutenant Philip D. Mason and others, military medals, cavalry bugle calls, war songs, family records, and a genealogy of his wife, Ann Hasseltine Sanford Preston

prefercite.p: A brief sketch of the life of Noble D. Preston, Manuscripts and Archives Division, The New York Public Library

altformavail.p: Available on microfilm; New York Public Library; *ZL-461
